extendedInfo.description: Free version of Battles and Castles! Turn-based strategy game based on such famous series as Heroes Of Might and Magic or Civilization. You will recruit knights, discover mines and treasures, build houses, stables, academies and fortifications to fulfill all the missions in campaign mode. All of this takes place in mysterious, fantasy medieval, complete 3D world. Features: - more than 20 different units including knights, archers, catapults, cannons, orcs and mages- about 20 different buildings and fortifications to make a powerful kingdom - 3 different technology levels - 2 campaign modes with 5 complex missions each (more in full version)- skirmish mode with AI players (mire levels in full version)- multiplayer mode on one device (in full version)- unique graphics and complete 3D world Take control over one of the powerful clans, fight against beasts and knights to create an impressive kingdom!

reviews.title: 4Th
reviews.comment: 4th level is glitched I get zoomed out all the way can\'t see anything or zoom in. Castle clan If I cud play ud have 4 stars
reviews.author: Mike Fallon

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: The idea and gameplay are both well done. I would like to see a more convient way to choose the soldier i want to move. I end up moving a different, already selected soldier.  Also, I wish I could change the camera\'s angle.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Well put together
reviews.comment: I wish online multiplayer was available for free ... Then more people would be interested in downloading the game ... Even promoting the game to friends and coworkers!
reviews.author: William Lawes

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: Like the other comment said, lot of potential though it\'s pretty fun right now maybe just faster pace, better camera controls and fine tuning
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent concept, poor execution
reviews.comment: See a lot of potential coming out of this. Just need to be refined and optimized more. Better animations, a little faster paced, maybe a tutorial or help pop ups.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good Game!
reviews.comment: Cute, relaxing, and fun.  Takes too long to load, though.  The more I play, the more I enjoy it.  I do think the developer should speed up play and or increase the toons\' travel range.  Since so many reviews suggest the game speed be increased, why haven\'t you done this simple adjustment?  Give your potential customers what they are asking for - really, you need to listen to our input if you want more than just a \"good\" game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun game quie a few glitches
reviews.comment: SAVE OFTEN. Crashes quite a bit along with movment tiles not disappearing after deselecting a unit and other small bugs. Still a very fun game to play if you can get over all the issues
reviews.author: kenny macy

reviews.title: Abc
reviews.comment: Stuck in loading where it shows unity logo
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Glitchy
reviews.comment: The free version only has five levels. The paid version only costs 99 cents, but it has a major glitch. When I load a saved game, I get a locked up screen and I can\'t do anything. If they can fix the glitch, it would be a fun game for the money. Looks like a medieval Lego castle siege game.
reviews.author: A. Nonymous

reviews.title: Not good enough
reviews.comment: Not worth spending time if you cannot save and you loose the progress if you hut return button. Too slow and still to buggy.
reviews.author: Thomas Zili

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Good concept and gameplay. I would love to see an option to move more than one soldier at once, and the option to destroy buildings you have made (like walls) :)
